title: Reticulated bowl with saucer
description: two pieces--bowl and saucer; bowl has slightly domed base; oval shape; slightly outward-flaring rim; perforations on outer sides; saucer has slightly convex inner bottom; rim with rectangular perforations; heavy base; both pieces decorated with rust-colored ailing ship over gilt waves; bands of purple, pink and rust-colored flowers; blue dots between perforations; bowl has floral band at top at exterior; orange, blue and gilt band around bottom on exterior on bowl; for the American market
